detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract MEMORYCOIN (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MEMORYCOIN.sol#102-223) has payable functions:
	 - MEMORYCOIN.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MEMORYCOIN.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
